title: Paul Laurence Dunbar (TEFC)
brief_description: Presents some of the live-action stories written by Paul Laurence Dunbar, pointing out that even though he lived in a period that offered a black writer only poverty, he was ale to write both lyrical poetry and stories that dealt with themes that are still relevant today.
